html:
7.20.19  6:24 am   I have a great idea that can help you remove some pressure from people demanding more content: Take some of the old classic Bill Wurtz songs that we all love (Crazy/raining, Bob Marley, I Can Play, The Road etc.) and put them up on Spotify! That would generate some hype in the community and give you some more time to figure out your new software in peace.

Thanks :)
7.20.19  5:10 am   Did you know that there is a legitimate argument for the idea that water is not wet?
7.20.19  3:51 am   Do you find yourself being recognised by fans in public often?
7.20.19  1:47 am   Ever eat a burrito and wish it was filled with stew?
7.20.19  1:00 am   Are you coming back?
7.19.19  11:17 pm   what makes music awesome? thabks
7.19.19  11:11 pm   Why do most of you videos involving wanting you or someone to come home?
7.19.19  11:08 pm   do you follow a specific process to make your videos?
7.19.19  10:46 pm   I wrote a song whilst experiencing an anomalous creative surge and now I'm worried I'll never write a better song. Have you ever experienced this?
7.19.19  9:14 pm   Are still making videos?
7.19.19  8:43 pm   I want to name my lamp, what is a good name for a lamp?
7.19.19  8:34 pm   Where did the kitten who usually hangs out in my backyard go? I'm concerned for her saftey.
7.19.19  7:35 pm   yknow if you wait long enough (like 25 years or so) technology might progress to the point where it could automatically transcribe most of the source material of the notebook page
7.19.19  6:32 pm   have you ever noticed how *perfect* water is?

7.19.19  6:21 pm   Please, please, please be so kind and answer this question Bill!

Preamble: you generate a ton of files: text files for ideas, journals, lyrics, scripts, etc etc, images, pictures, screenshots, audio recordings, video recordings, combinations of all of the above when you start editing and putting them together, and all the other things I'm probably missing.

Actual question: how do you organize all that?

      Final rant: I feel that so many of my ideas and projects get stuck just because my laptop is a mess, I have files all over the place, and an organizing system that has a lot of room for improvement and I use only inconsistently. I don't know exactly how or where to start improving this. I'm also afraid that organizing could be a very long project in of itself. HELP!

Thanks a lot!

7.19.19  4:19 pm   do you plan on releasing anything in the near future?

7.19.19  3:05 pm   is it weird (or will it be weird) going through [massive technology transformation] and also make reality videos about the nearly year long struggle that was making hotewig? since you were going through a similar but smaller scale transformation with 3d animation at the time. do you feel like that was a completely different person?

7.19.19  2:30 pm   is your current technological adaptation an attempt to design a system of keyboard shortcuts/controls for every single thing you have to do when making a song video (and non-song videos too I suppose), and subsequently learning to use them fluently?

      If so, I think that's a genius idea to speed up the song-video release time to fit within the dream schedule. And it's totally worth a period of time with no new releases in order to give you a chance to learn it.
7.19.19  1:07 pm   what do you call that part when somebody is about to spill the beans about something important, but then somebody interrupts him/her.
7.19.19  11:47 am   7.18.19  12:09 am is "get from here to there" a valid purpose for buying a boat? or building one, for that matter?
7.19.19  10:52 am   7.18.19  10:06 pm wait what? Stream? have you been live streaming?
7.19.19  10:45 am   Hi Bill, fan club president here. You owe your membership fees, when can I expect them?
7.19.19  7:55 am   am i a cat
7.19.19  3:57 am   do you have a favorite videogame console you played on in your childhood? favorite videogame on that console?
7.19.19  3:22 am   Are you quitting videos, or making another video about history?
7.19.19  1:05 am   i really enjoyed the live stream.  i like watching your interviews.  you're doing a good job.  do you feel physically tired after?
7.19.19  12:53 am   can a state be legitimate
7.19.19  12:27 am   Will you make more youtube videos

7.19.19  12:20 am   when you combine a certain thing with another certain thing you can get an incredibly emotional moment. i take for example you songs: in i wanna be a movie star at the part "everybody wants more than just a friend" you added the phrase "let's reestructure the fabric of the known universe" in the video. the fact here is that you added it at a part when the melody has like a "rise" so it causes some kind of euphoria, mixed with adrenaline, inspiration and energy. i mean, if that sentence wouldn't be there it'd definitely have a less-powerful effect. i also noticed that in and the day goes on with the "mountain escape plan" and the "use a bike to escape the grid" at a calm part preparing for the "rising part" ("and i'm right where I belong"). but the truth is you do this a lot, countless times, do you do this on purpose?

      are you conscious of that effect you produce?

      and how do you know where, when, whenst and how to use it?
7.18.19  11:45 pm   How big is the rock you live under

7.18.19  10:28 pm   Hi Bill,

With regards to your desire to use AppleScript to press buttons that Automator cannot write scripts for, have you attempted to use macOS's GUI Scripting festures? See the Apple Developer guide here:

https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/LanguagesUtilities/Conceptual/MacAutomationScriptingGuide/AutomatetheUserInterface.html

Hope this helps.

Take care, give care, kill all cops,
-Maymay
7.18.19  10:06 pm   I noticed that you want to do mocap in that recent stream.did you know you can do mocap with a Kinect?
7.18.19  10:05 pm   so do you eat Ice?

7.18.19  8:11 pm   im a weird astral thing stuck in a humanoid body, which i guess is just as equally a weird astral thing... maybe. hm.. and i belong making music and creating what i feel, because living around all these people isnt doing it anything but... confining. constraining. ive barely lived out my life, but i have trouble. the main problem now seems to be i have a shitty laptop and cant find the software thats right, thats cheap or free or whatever.. but all the other pieces are there to start. any wise words?

      i have guitars. i have drums. no keys. no software. no mics.

      no money. its pretty fucked to be stuck. but i know things will move with time. patience. this is an awful question. . oops. awful questions are worth asking too, sometimes. hm. if you get to this, know its giant for me. thanks, bill. you inspire me infinitely. even if this goes unanswered (how does one answer this anyway)

7.18.19  8:06 pm   I had my phone audio on mono for ~6 months without knowing it by accident, and I switched it off today, allowing songs to make full use of my car's surround sound speakers. Contrary to my expectations since you are a small indie producer with little/no outside help, your songs made great use of it (particularly when i get older). Do you design music with different types of speakers that might play them in mind?

      Do you listen to your tracks in various ways (eg mono, stereo, surround) to see how that might affect them?
7.18.19  7:14 pm   whos your parents
7.18.19  5:25 pm   hey bill, me and my friends decided to play parrot or carrot, but we dont know how to play it. can you leave instructions? thabk you
7.18.19  5:22 pm   what do you think about people trying to be a smartass by saying that old music is better than modern music.

7.18.19  4:51 pm   Don't know why you say you aren't a good guitarist. Quote from the comments of I'm Crazy / It's Raining: "If that guitar playing wasn't quantized...he is one of the most in-time, scary, skilled, studio-quality musicians out there." My one (nerdy) question is, what type of guitar do you play in that video?

      I'll take a random guess that it's a 60's-era Japanese brand, but I'd be intrigued to find out. Lovely clean sound.

7.18.19  3:11 pm   hey bill are those chords right? (love takes time mariah carey verses) B, F#/A#, G#m, D#m/F# (B/D#), C#m, B/D#, F#sus, F#. oh and what is the chord after the F# major?? (i think it's an F#add2 but i'm not sure) thx :)
